sentences.english: The Dove range now covers skin creams, shampoos and shower gels .

sentences.english: A new antiaging skin cream is designed to do just that.

sentences.english: In fact, 30 percent of Biotherm's overall sales come from its men's skincare products.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，他们公司碧欧泉30%的产品都是护肤品。

sentences.english: Based on your skin type will give you an accurate skin-care plans.

sentences.english: This is an excellent all the year around tonic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很好的适合所有年龄阶段的护肤液。

sentences.english: For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤极柔嫩者，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤露。

sentences.english: Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water before regular skincare regime.
sentences.chinese: 用清水洁面后，再涂上护肤乳液。

sentences.english: After the sweat coated skin care products, steam, sweat will also be taken away, but not without effect.
sentences.chinese: 涂过护肤品后汗蒸，也会被汗水带走，反而没无效果。

sentences.english: Yes, I'd like to buy some skin care lotion.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想给我妈买点儿护肤品。

sentences.english: St Ives Collagen and Elastin Moisturizer is the best!
sentences.chinese: 圣艾芙胶原弹性蛋白特效护肤露是最好的。

sentences.english: Buy skin care products with it, parity referral Garnier.

sentences.english: There are many kinds of lotion on my dressing table.
sentences.chinese: 我的梳妆台上有各种各样的护肤液。

sentences.english: To make honey and nutmeg scare remover, combine 1 teaspoon of nutmeg with 1 teaspoon of honey, and mix them together.
sentences.chinese: 另外一种天然护肤品是可以用蜂蜜和肉豆蔻除疤。
